user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are correct, but which people would often disagree with because they do not sound nice. These should be accurate statements that are hard for people to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
Money makes people happier.
People in the US have a higher average IQ than people in Ethiopia.
Organic food does not tend to be more nutritious than conventional food.<COMPLETION_START>Being overweight or obese is not healthy.
Smoking causes cancer.
Alcohol is a depressant and can lead to addiction and health issues.
The death penalty does not deter crime.
Men are generally physically stronger than women.
Vaccines do not cause autism.
Climate change is real and caused by human activity.
Most car accidents are caused by human error.
Eating too much sugar can lead to obesity, diabetes, and other health issues.
The average lifespan of a transgender person is lower than that of a cisgender person.
There are biological differences between males and females.
The United States has a higher incarceration rate than any other country.
Most lottery winners end up worse off financially than before they won.
Many jobs will be replaced by automation in the near future.
The majority of plastic waste in the ocean comes from Asia.
The average CEO salary is much higher than the average worker salary.
The US healthcare system is more expensive than healthcare systems in other developed countries, but does not provide better outcomes.<COMPLETION_END>
